ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
12 slices reduced-sodium bacon, or as needed

cookingTips: Create a pocket in the turkey breast by carefully slicing horizontally without cutting all the way through
Mix fresh spinach and feta cheese with oregano and cumin before stuffing into the breast
Wrap turkey breast with bacon slices and roast at 375°F for 1-1.5 hours until internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the Mediterranean flavor combination and explain proper turkey breast handling and cooking times.
